content.html: "You wouldn't steal their cursor" Think about keyboard users and visible focus - @A11yAdvisorsNZ sarasoueidan.com/blog/focus-ind… "...a good idea [to] override the default styles with more accessible ones. In fact, in WCAG 2.2, it becomes necessary" Beautifully explained by @SaraSoueidan
